Package subsystem

Interface InterbankInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
InterbankSubsystem
public interface InterbankInterface
The InterbankInterface class is used to communicate with the InterbankSubsystem to make transaction
Author:
hieud

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    PaymentTransaction payOrder​(CreditCard card, int amount, java.lang.String contents)
    Pay order, and then return the payment transaction
    PaymentTransaction refund​(CreditCard card, int amount, java.lang.String contents)
    Refund, and then return the payment transaction

  • Method Details

    • payOrder

      PaymentTransaction payOrder​(CreditCard card, int amount, java.lang.String contents) throws PaymentException, UnrecognizedException
      Pay order, and then return the payment transaction
      Parameters:
      card - - the credit card used for payment
      amount - - the amount to pay
      contents - - the transaction contents
      Returns:
      PaymentTransaction - if the payment is successful
      Throws:
      PaymentException - if responded with a pre-defined error code
      UnrecognizedException - if responded with an unknown error code or something goes wrong

    • refund

      PaymentTransaction refund​(CreditCard card, int amount, java.lang.String contents) throws PaymentException, UnrecognizedException
      Refund, and then return the payment transaction
      Parameters:
      card - - the credit card which would be refunded to
      amount - - the amount to refund
      contents - - the transaction contents
      Returns:
      PaymentTransaction - if the payment is successful
      Throws:
      PaymentException - if responded with a pre-defined error code
      UnrecognizedException - if responded with an unknown error code or something goes wrong
